channel.title: No black box
channel.description: hey, i have seen a few servers that as soon as u open the client the black box disappears and the client still runs. currently my black box stays open, how do i make it disappear and client still runs?

item.title: No black box
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

i didnt just copy and paste it, i added the exit at the end, didnt work. there was another line that i added that made it say cannot find specified path but it would still run. other then those 2 there it was all the same exept for the line where it runs from and when i tried adding that it said cannot find path specified and closed instantly without running client. those were the only things diff.

Read full topic

item.title: No black box
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Darkmagic42:

didnt work:/ i copied and pasted the code from another cline to and it said the path could not be specified. no jdk types or anything to change either so idk what the path should be

you dont just copy and paste it… i said study it and look at whats different, look at yours and find something that would look like it would have effect on the cmd…

Read full topic

item.title: No black box
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

in the run batch code, usually at the end it will say pause if it stays, try replacing that with something like “exit” without the quotes, or something like that i cant remember, and it should work, if that doesnt work, study other clients run batch code which the “black box” as you say exits, and see whats different from your run batch code.

P.S. its called a CMD or command prompt.

Read full topic
